showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:31}); // {Cloud}
hmm.
So that's what this is all about.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:33}); // {Cloud}
I'll explain later.
Right now, the only thing I'm thinking
about is beating Sephiroth.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:34}); // {Cloud}
He's here.
The real Sephiroth is
just beyond here.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:35}); // {Cloud}
It's both incredibly wicked and cruel{PAUSE}But it's releasing a powerfully strong will
from deep within the Planet's wound.
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:29}); // Received Key Item "Black Materia"!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:36}); // {Cloud}
The Black Materia is
back in our hands.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:37}); // {Cloud}
Now all we have to do is defeat
Sephiroth and that'll be the end of it.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:42}); // {Cloud}
I don't think I can

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:43}); // {Cloud}
We're going in first!
You guys stay and keep watch.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:44}); // {Barret}
Sephiroth
What a damn crazy #*&^%.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:46}); // {Barret}
Damn! The pressure's on now.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:40}); // {Cloud}
Don't give it to ANYONE.
I'm counting on you.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:44}); // {Barret}
Sephiroth
What a damn crazy #*&^%.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:44}); // {Barret}
Sephiroth
What a damn crazy #*&^%.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // {Barret}
Are {Cloud} and
the others alright?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // {Barret}
But what's up with that?
One little piece of Materia,
destroying the planet

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // {Barret}
Where are we?
Where did we end up?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:10}); // {Barret}
Something's weird here!
It got pitch black all of a sudden, and
everyone disappeared!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:11}); // {Barret}
Yeayeah!{PAUSE}I don't know what's goin' on,
but let's just get on with it.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:49}); // {Tifa}
We'd better not
take the Black Materia any further.
Why don't you give it
to someone else to hold on to?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:17}); // {Barret}, you're here!
I'm so glad!!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:18}); // {Red XIII}, you're here!
I'm so glad!!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:12}); // Everyone's waiting!
{Cloud}'s in trouble!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:13}); // Please come.
Help us!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:15}); // hee hee hee
And remember

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:47}); // {Tifa}
Not Sephiroth!?
You mean all this time
it wasn't Sephiroth we've been after?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:49}); // {Tifa}
We'd better not
take the Black Materia any further.
Why don't you give it
to someone else to hold on to?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:51}); // {Red XIII}
What's happening, {Cloud}?
That wasn't Sephiroth!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:54}); // {Red XIII}
You want me to take the Black Materia?
All right, I understand.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:40}); // {Cloud}
Don't give it to ANYONE.
I'm counting on you.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:19}); // {Red XIII}
I wonder how {Cloud} and
the others are?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:20}); // {Red XIII}
It's hard to believe
such a small piece of Materia
could destroy the Planet.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:22}); // {Red XIII}
Is everyone all right?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:25}); // {Red XIII}
Where am I!?
Don't leave me alone!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:27}); // {Red XIII}
Something is strange
Why was it dark all of a sudden
and where is everybody?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:28}); // {Red XIII}
R, right!{PAUSE}I'm not sure I understand
but I'll go if you want me to.

ops.raw: a5 00 00 d1 00 ca fe d7 fe 15 00

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:57}); // {Cid}
Me and Black Materia just don't mix.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:56}); // {Cid}
Let me catch some shut-eye.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:58}); // {Yuffie}
What!?
You mean that wasn't Sephiroth?
All that time I was following this
thing?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:60}); // {Yuffie}
I don't want anything
to do with that Black Materia!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:59}); // {Yuffie}
Shouldn't we hurry?
The real Sephiroth is still close, right?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:61}); // {Cait Sith}
You serious!?
That's not Sephiroth!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:63}); // {Cait Sith}
No, not the
Black Materia, please.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:62}); // {Cait Sith}
Something feels rea---lly weird here!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:67}); // {Vincent}
You mean
we weren't in pursuit of Sephiroth?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:66}); // {Vincent}
How about if you hold on
to the Black Materia?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:65}); // {Vincent}
You never know when Sephiroth may show up
so don't let your guard down.

ops.raw: a5 00 00 f4 ff e8 ff 38 ff 05 00

dialogStrings:
{Barret}
But what's up with that?
One little piece of Materia,
destroying the planet

{Barret}
Where are we?
Where did we end up?

{Barret}
Something's weird here!
It got pitch black all of a sudden, and
everyone disappeared!

{Barret}
Yeayeah!{PAUSE}I don't know what's goin' on,
but let's just get on with it.

{Red XIII}, you're here!
I'm so glad!!

{Red XIII}
I wonder how {Cloud} and
the others are?

{Red XIII}
It's hard to believe
such a small piece of Materia
could destroy the Planet.

{Red XIII}
Where am I!?
Don't leave me alone!

{Red XIII}
Something is strange
Why was it dark all of a sudden
and where is everybody?

{Red XIII}
R, right!{PAUSE}I'm not sure I understand
but I'll go if you want me to.

{Cloud}
hmm.
So that's what this is all about.

{Cloud}
I'll explain later.
Right now, the only thing I'm thinking
about is beating Sephiroth.

{Cloud}
He's here.
The real Sephiroth is
just beyond here.

{Cloud}
It's both incredibly wicked and cruel{PAUSE}But it's releasing a powerfully strong will
from deep within the Planet's wound.

{Cloud}
The Black Materia is
back in our hands.

{Cloud}
Now all we have to do is defeat
Sephiroth and that'll be the end of it.

{Cloud}
Don't give it to ANYONE.
I'm counting on you.

{Cloud}
Hold on to this
I don't trust myself.

{Cloud}
We're going in first!
You guys stay and keep watch.

{Tifa}
Not Sephiroth!?
You mean all this time
it wasn't Sephiroth we've been after?

{Tifa}
We'd better not
take the Black Materia any further.
Why don't you give it
to someone else to hold on to?

Give the Black Materia to {Red XIII}?
{CHOICE}Yes
{CHOICE}No

{Red XIII}
You want me to take the Black Materia?
All right, I understand.

{Cid}
Me and Black Materia just don't mix.

{Yuffie}
What!?
You mean that wasn't Sephiroth?
All that time I was following this
thing?

{Yuffie}
Shouldn't we hurry?
The real Sephiroth is still close, right?

{Yuffie}
I don't want anything
to do with that Black Materia!

{Cait Sith}
No, not the
Black Materia, please.

{Vincent}
You never know when Sephiroth may show up
so don't let your guard down.

{Vincent}
How about if you hold on
to the Black Materia?

{Vincent}
You mean
we weren't in pursuit of Sephiroth?
